price: 人々が、次々と集団でアッラー*の宗教（イスラーム*）に入るのを見たならば、
arabic: وَرَأَيۡتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدۡخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفۡوَاجٗا

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wara-ayta al-nāsa yadkhulūna fī dīni al-lahi afwājan
